snippet: The investigation into the death of a driver struck by the Nascar driver Tony Stewart in a sprint car race last month is complete, the Ontario County, N.Y., sheriff’s department said Thursday.
abstract: Authorities say investigation into death of Kevin Ward Jr, driver struck by Nascar's Tony Stewart, is complete and they will announce later if Stewart will face charges.
lead_paragraph: The investigation into the death of a driver struck by the Nascar driver Tony Stewart in a sprint car race last month is complete, the Ontario County, N.Y., sheriff’s department said Thursday.

headline.main: Inquiry Complete in Tony Stewart Case
